Passage: Kevin Feige (/ˈfaɪɡi/, FYE-gee; born June 2, 1973)[1][2]  is an American film producer who has been president of Marvel Studios since 2007.[3] The films he has produced have a combined worldwide box office gross of over $17 billion.[4] Feige is a member of the Producers Guild of America. summary: Kevin Feige (/ˈfaɪɡi/, FYE-gee; born June 2, 1973)[1][2]  is an American film producer who has been president of Marvel Studios since 2007.[3] The films he has produced have a combined worldwide box office gross of over $17 billion.[4] Feige is a member of the Producers Guild of America. In 2019, he earned a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Picture for producing Black Panther.
question: Who is head of Marvel Studios?
label: Kevin Feige
